thread.title: Jemma Lucy snogs Chantelle Connelly's MUM as she meets girlfriend's family on wild night out
thread.title_full: Jemma Lucy snogs Chantelle Connelly's MUM as she meets girlfriend's family on wild night out

title: Jemma Lucy snogs Chantelle Connelly's MUM as she meets girlfriend's family on wild night out
text:
mum's the word Jemma Lucy snogs Chantelle Connelly’s MUM as she meets girlfriend’s family on wild night out 
Ex On The Beach star has an unusual way of winning over the in-laws By LOUISE RANDELL, Senior Showbiz Reporter 5th February 2017, 11:05 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments JEMMA Lucy proved she has an unusual way of winning over the in-laws by snogging her girlfriend’s mum on a night out. 
The Ex On The Beach star met Chantelle Connelly’s family over the weekend, and ended up locking lips with her mother. Snapchat Jemma Lucy was caught on camera snogging her girlfriend’s mum 
Chantelle invited her lover to meet her mum, and Jemma stepped up her outrageous antics. 
The tattooed beauty was caught on camera enjoying a saucy smooch with her girlfriend’s mum during the evning. 
The former Geordie Shore star shared a picture of the pair kissing on her Snapchat page. 
She captioned the racy image: “Introducing my girl to the mother.” 
The pair later headed to a night club in Essex, where they continued their raunchy antics. Chantelle Connelly takes girlfriend Jemma Lucy to her mum's birthday p Snapchat Chantelle also posed for pictures with her mother during the night out Jemma Lucy helps girlfriend Chantelle Connelly celebrate her mum's bi 
Jemma and Chantelle were both seen getting up close and personal with other party-goers at the Club 195 in Epping. 
The Ex On The Beach star was even seen snogging another man during the wild night of clubbing. 
But she stayed close to her girlfriend and was pictured grabbing her legs and attempting to pick her up. Fame Flynet Jemma and Chantelle went wild at a night club in Essex Fame Flynet Jemma was spotted locking lips with a hunky stranger Fame Flynet The pair got passionate in front of the cameras Fame Flynet 17 Jemma also stayed close to her girlfriend during the night 
Jemma recently split from Celebrity Big Brother winner Stephen Bear, and Chantelle called time on her relationship with on/off boyfriend Tommy Sayers. 
Bear is now dating another Geordie Shore star - Charlotte Crosby. Fame Flynet Chantelle got a hug from a male party-goer Fame Flynet The girls posed for pictures together in the night club Fame Flynet They looked happier than ever in each other's company Fame Flynet Jemma even attempted to pick her lover up - literally Fame Flynet Chantelle did not seem keen to be lifted up Fame Flynet The move almost ended in disaster Jemma Lucy and Chantelle Connelly go topless for racy new photoshoot Related stories JUST DANCE Lady Gaga wows the audience at Superbowl Half Time Show as she FLIES into the stadium BE MYL VALENTINE Myleene Klass sizzles as she models her new underwear collection just in time for Valentine's Day 'TIME FOR PEOPLE TO WAKE UP TO DAVE' Piers Morgan slams David Beckham as 'a fraud' and calls leaked emails 'sickening' 'I didn't feel good' Former Towie star Danielle Armstrong reveals slimmed down frame after dropping a stone in 12 weeks SMILEY SELFIE Scarlett Moffatt all smiles in selfie after lovesplit with boyfriend Luke Crodden time for a swift one Taylor Swift shows off her endless legs in pre-Super Bowl bash as she reveals show will be her only gig in 2017 'You threw me under the bus!' Vogue Williams mortified as The Jump's Davina McCall quizzes her about Spencer Matthews Bowled over Chrissy Teigen, John Legend and Mark Wahlberg lead the celebrities arriving for Super Bowl Sunday in Texas TV PICKS What's on TV tonight? Shows to watch on Monday 6 February from Apple Tree Yard to SAS: Rogue Traders PREDICTION Tamara Ecclestone reveals she WILL have another baby and it will be a boy after psychics predict her future THE WAITING The Wanted's Tom Parker postpones wedding to play Danny Zuko in Grease The Musical Looking super Lady Gaga accidentally flashes her knickers as she prepares to perform during the Superbowl's half time show Fame Flynet Chantelle gave her girl a big hug in the air Fame Flynet The couple were seen holding hands outside Fame Flynet 17 Jemma and Chantelle shared a sweet smooch 
Drama seems to be the name of the game for Jemma lately as she was recently forced to deny reports she slept with arch rival Katie Price's husband Kieran Hayler . 
There had been reports that Katie was "terrified" the Jemma was going to name her hubby as one of her conquests.
